hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :the Prophet said: "I was about to order my boys to collect bundles of firewood, then order Salat to be held, then burn (the homes) of the people who did not attend the Salat

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ يَسْمَعُ النِّدَاءَ فَلاَ يُجِيبُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About One Who Heard the Call (to Prayer) But Did Not Respond To It
